interactivity.requirements: You must be on at least Day  114  to unlock this Event. You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Reset " Seen " Scouting Mission " from Sana Sakakibara
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplay during weekday if requirements are met

progression.synopsis: Wandering around town, Sensei finds Kaori eating a hot, circular cheese-and-tomato wheel. She asks why he is without a young girl, since he always had one with him on their previous meetings â€” she suspects him of involvement in a human trafficking ring. His explanation that he is a teacher does not convince her. They talk about how Kaori works in so many different places, and whether she has any hobbies. Sensei tells her that she needs some more interesting things to do, and that he could show her some. She accepts, giving him her phone number and some of her pizza.
trivia: If Good Day, Humans (one of Rin 's events) has been seen, Sensei will mention Kaori's photos.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.6.
